.. _constants:

Constants
=========

.. py:data:: kafkastreamer.TYPE_CREATE

   Object was created.

.. py:data:: kafkastreamer.TYPE_UPDATE

   Object was updated.

.. py:data:: kafkastreamer.TYPE_DELETE

   Object was deleted.

.. py:data:: kafkastreamer.TYPE_REFRESH

   Refresh message (for example nightly full refresh).

.. py:data:: kafkastreamer.TYPE_ENUMERATE

   Enumerate actual object IDs.

.. py:data:: kafkastreamer.TYPE_EOS

   End of stream message.
